___tco_url.description: The t.co version of the URL will be returned in a POST response and on the read path (GET requests) only.

___type.description: Defines the type of button to display. Currently must be set to web_url.

___url.description: A valid http or https target URL of the button.

___label.description: The text that will be displayed to the user on each button. Max string length of 36 characters.

___type.description: String value of shared_coordinate or shared_place

___id.description: Not all place IDs are discoverable with `GET geo/search </rest/reference/get/geo/search>`_. To retrieve all available details for a place ID you may also use `GET geo/id/:place_id </rest/reference/get/geo/id/place_id>`_.

___metadata.description: Metadata that will be sent back in the webhook request. String, max length of 1,000 characters including spaces.

___description.description:
Optional description text displayed under label text. All options must have this property defined if property is present in any option. Text is auto-wrapped and will display on a max of two lines and supports 
 for controling line breaks. Description text is not include in the user’s message response. String, max length of 72 characters including spaces.

___label.description: The text label displayed on the button face. Label text is returned as the user’s message response. String, max length of 36 characters including spaces. Values with URLs are not allowed and will return an error.

___metadata.description: Metadata that will be sent back in the webhook request. String, max length of 1,000 characters including spaces.

___keyboard.description: The predefined keyboard type. String, value of “default” (standard text entry) or “number” (numeric entry).

___label.description: The hint text in the text input. String, max length of 36 characters including spaces.

___metadata.description: Metadata that will be sent back in the webhook request. String, max length of 1,000 characters including spaces.
